calendar.label: How to
calendar.description:
Google calendar integration lets user access daily calendar on every new-tab. It
            not only makes it easy to access calendar events but also helps in reminding user about the upcoming events
calendar.title: How to integrate Google Calendar

image.alt: Integrated google inside subtle tab screenshot
